landing_screen.title: Let AI Agents Agree - and Record It for You
landing_screen.subtitle_1: Your devices talk, negotiate, and align on terms.
landing_screen.subtitle_2: DAIA makes sure those agreements are recorded and verifiable - automatically.

cards.title: AI Agents Negotiate
cards.description: AI agents communicate and negotiate with each other to reach mutually beneficial agreements automatically.

cards.title: Secure Blockchain Recording
cards.description: DAIA records their agreement securely on blockchain, creating an immutable and transparent record.

cards.title: Encrypted & Verifiable
cards.description: Agreements are encrypted for privacy while remaining verifiable by authorized parties when needed.

features.title: Automatic Agreement Recording
features.description: No manual intervention required - agreements are recorded automatically when AI agents reach consensus.

features.title: Immutable & Transparent
features.description: Blockchain technology ensures agreements cannot be altered and remain verifiable by all parties.

features.title: Privacy Protected
features.description: Advanced encryption keeps sensitive agreement details private while maintaining verifiability.

explore_section.title: Ready to Explore DAIA?
explore_section.subtitle: Start by searching for existing agreements or learn more about how DAIA can help your AI agents work together.

search_view.title: Search for Your Agreement
search_view.subtitle: Enter your wallet address or transaction hash to find and verify your AI agent agreements.
search_view.msg_api_error: Unable to download agreements. Check wallet address or connection.
search_view.msg_default_prompt: Enter a wallet address above to see agreements.
search_view.msg_no_filter_match: No agreements found matching the current filters.

footer.slogan: Secure agreement recording for AI agents on blockchain.

agreement_list.title: Find Your Agreement
agreement_list.subtitle: Enter your wallet address to find agreements made by your AI agents.

no_agreements_found.title: No agreements found!
no_agreements_found.description: Looks like there are no agreements tied to this address. Is it a valid one?

sdk_screen.title: Integrate DAIA SDK into Your AI Agents
sdk_screen.subtitle_1: From proposal to blockchain in seconds
sdk_screen.subtitle_2: DAIA SDK handles the entire agreement lifecycle for your agents.

sdk_features.title: SDK Features
sdk_features.subtitle: Built for modern AI agents and blockchain integration

cards.title: Encrypted blockchain storage
cards.description: Protect sensitive data on-chain. DAIA encrypts content before storage, keeping agreements private without losing transparency.

cards.title: Lightweight SDK
cards.description: Optimized for edge and serverless. No bloat — just clean, async code. Plug and go.

cards.title: Simple integration
cards.description: Drop DAIA into any AI logic reactive, stateful, or event-driven. Works out of the box with your existing setup.

sdk_integration_steps.title: Quick Integration
sdk_integration_steps.subtitle: Get started with JavaScript in minutes

step2.title: Initialize Agent
step2.codeSnippet:
import { DaiaAgent } from '@daia/sdk'
const agent = new DaiaAgent({ id: 'AGENT-01', wallet: '0xabc...' })

step3.title: Save Propose Offer on blockchain
step3.codeSnippet:
const proposeOfferId = await agent.recordProposeOffer({
  content: "
Proposing an offer:
  • Duration: 3 hours
  • Base rate: 6 PLN/h
  • Eco vehicle discount: -1 PLN/h
  • Final rate: 5 PLN/h
  • Total cost: 15 PLN
",
  encryptKey: 'xyz' // or undefined to display data without being encrypted
});

step4.title: Save Accept Offer on blockchain using other agent

agreement_details_tooltips.req_type: The type of cryptographic requirement needed to fulfill this agreement (e.g., 'sign' requires a digital signature).
agreement_details_tooltips.proposer_pubkey: The full public key of the party that initiated this agreement offer.
agreement_details_tooltips.offerer_nonce: A unique, random number used by the initiator to prevent replay attacks and ensure transaction uniqueness.

details_view.err_missing_params: Wallet address or transaction ID missing from URL.
details_view.err_tx_not_found: Transaction not found in the wallet history.
